open.description: Frogfoot has informed us of a network outage affecting Boksburg, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Frogfoot engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

updates.content: The Vumatel team is still busy investigating the packet loss and Degraded service.

open.title: Metrofibre Degraded Service | Eastern Cape
open.description: We are investigating reports of degraded service affecting clients on the Metrofibre network in the Eastern Cape. We are working on identifying and resolving this issue as quickly as possible. We apologize for any inconvenience that this may be causing.

open.title: Openserve Web Connect Outage | Multiple Regions
open.description: Openserve Web Connect has informed us of a network outage affecting multiple Regions, affected clients will experience limited to no connectivity. Openserve Web Connect engineers are working on resolving this issue as soon as possible. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience caused.

open.title: Vumatel installation and maintenance problems | Khayelitsha & Delft
open.description: We would like to inform you about the challenges that we are currently experiencing with installation & maintenance activities in the Khayelitsha and Delft areas, Western Cape. Due to increased violence in this area, our contractor partners are not able to freely access the area to work. All maintenance and installation activities in this area will be on hold until further notice. The safety of our contractor partners remains our priority.
